concepts.name: frame
concepts.description: A mental structure for representing a stereotypical situation.

concepts.name: slot
concepts.description: A component of a frame representing an attribute or relation.

concepts.name: filler
concepts.description: A value or sub-frame that fits into a specific slot.

concepts.name: percept
concepts.description: A piece of sensory information or data point from the environment.

concepts.name: configuration
concepts.description: The current state of slot-filler assignments in a frame.

assertions.name: goodClassification
assertions.description: A frame is successfully classified when all mandatory slots are filled with fillers that match observations.
